Trade/Device Name(s): ACON BUP One Step Buprenorphine Test Strip
ACON BUP One Step Buprenorphine Test Device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ACON BUP One Step Buprenorphine Test Strip and Device, qualitative urine immunoassay for buprenorphine drug compliance screening
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassays for qualitative detection of Buprenorphine in human urine at 10 ng/mL cutoff, used by healthcare professionals including point-of-care for drug compliance determination; preliminary results require confirmatory testing.
